text:
@GavinNewsom Week Ahead Reminder:
- You spent a BILLION dollars in masks from China. 
- You want to release criminals from prison as a means to combat #COVID19
- You allow cramped protests and riots with no consequences.
- You are crippling the CA economy.
#RecallGavinNewsom
